New Records: Emi Martinez saved two penalties in the shootout
Key Match Events: Ecuador's late equalizer by Kevin Rodriguez
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi had limited touches (11) due to Ecuador's pressing
Ecuador focused on controlling midfield and limiting Messi's space
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni expressed frustration but praised the team's resilience
Emi Martinez was hailed as a penalty shootout hero
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was described as 'fast and choppy' affecting play
Lisandro Martinez scored his first international goal from a corner kick
Others: Ecuador had a golden chance with Jordy Caicedo's header missing
Argentina won four straight penalty shootouts since Emi Martinez became their goalkeeper
